name: Petrichor: Kōgeki
description:
Two characters (Langlee and Hector) are chained together for the battle ahead of them. Players will need to orient and interchange their positions to protect one another. Both have a separate and unique immunity to opposite types of projectiles. Players can free-form movement for both characters for maximum results. If one of the characters dies the game ends. Good luck!

Controls
WASD - movement
Space - Control both at once or Control one at a time
Left click - Langlee attacks
Right Click - Hector attacks
